description: Premier sailing catamaran offering snorkel trips to Lanai or Molokini.
Authentic, award-winning luau focusing on Hawaiian history and hula.
Viewing the sunrise from the 10,023ft summit; spiritual and cold experience.
Circle island tours, waterfall views, Eco-Star choppers.
The largest tropical reef aquarium in the Western Hemisphere.
Ziplining course on the slopes of Haleakala with swinging bridges.
Canyoneering tours rappelling down 30-50ft jungle waterfalls.
Underwater tour in a real submarine to view reefs and wrecks.
